pages.text: $(bold)Evaporation$()$(br)I always found it odd that (almost) every end creature hates water, but never their drops, or other items originating from there.$(br2)So, now a bunch of End materials disappear on contact with water! (Ender Pearl stasis chambers are still possible though.)
$(bold)Chorus Fruits$()$(br)Chorus Fruits now nullify fall distance when eaten.$(br2)$(bold)Combat Changes$()$(br)The video below demonstrates the combat changes introduced!

$(bold)Next are (mostly) other mods' changes$()$(br)$(li)Dispensers can fully interact with cauldrons!$(li)Elytras can be customized with dyes and banners. These can also be applies to individual wings if you separate them!$(li)Tridents received some QoL, including Loyalty ones coming back from the void!$(li)Bundles are craftable, and can be used to randomize blocks while building!

$(li)Explosions from other mobs no longer grief. All other mob griefing is turned on.$(li)Insomnia is disabled. If you want Phantoms, they spawn in certain End biomes!$(li)Grindstones can now remove enchantments from items and put them on books for a price!$(li)You can right-click crops to harvest them.$(li)While Zenith was taken out, I implemented my own version of the Sugarcane and Cactus buffs!
